title: Job Vacancies at Quicky Chillis Restaurant
content:
Quicky Chillis is a 24-hour restaurant in Adewale bus stop, Governors Road Ikotun, Lagos State.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) CCTV Watcher

Job Location: Ikotun, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Monitoring live video feeds
	Identifying suspicious activity or potential threats
	Alerting security personnel or law enforcement
	Recording and documenting incidents
	Maintaining situational awareness
	Following protocols and procedures
	Collaborating with security teams.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 1 - 4 years of experience.


Salary
N50,000 - N60,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chilisbyebevande247@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Chef

Job Location: Ikotun, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Preparing and cooking meals.
	Managing kitchen staff and workflow.
	Maintaining kitchen cleanliness and organization.
	Ensuring food quality and presentation.
	Developing new recipes and menus.
	Ordering supplies and managing inventory.
	Maintaining food safety and sanitation standards.
	Collaborating with other kitchen staff to ensure efficient service


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / HND qualification with 5 - 10 years of work experience.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chilisbyebevande247@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Waiter / Waitress

Job Location: Ikotun, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Taking Orders: Accurately taking food and drink orders from customers.
	Serving Food and Beverages: Delivering orders to customers in a timely manner.
	Providing Customer Service: Ensuring customers have a positive dining experience.
	Handling Payments: Processing transactions and handling customer payments.
	Maintaining Cleanliness: Keeping the dining area and tables clean and organized.
	Managing Tables: Coordinating table assignments and ensuring efficient service.
	Communicating with Kitchen Staff: Relay orders and feedback to kitchen staff.
	Handling Customer Complaints: Resolving issues and providing solutions.
	Multitasking: Managing multiple tables and tasks simultaneously


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 2 - 4 years of work experience.


Salary
N50,000 - N60,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 31st July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chilisbyebevande247@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
